summary: Summons a Steam Centurion Master to fight by your side.
descriptionHtml:
This new spell will summon a steam centurion master to fight by your side for 1800 seconds.
The spell tome can be found in whiterun,dragonsreach (on Farengars desk)
The only issue is that the description in the spell menu (although titled summon centurion) says summon flame atronach,i have changed the text description in the creation kit but it seems to revert back to this what ever i do so iv just accepted it for the time being.
author: iboomstickv2
